value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 12: Working with Parameters - Part 2

value.title: Adding Pre Calculated Rank in Power BI Using Power Query
value.excerpt: There are multiple ways that you can add a RANK column to your table, You can do that dynamically inside the Power BI report using DAX Measures, or you can do it pre-calculated. If you are doing a pre-calculated rank (let’s say for an aggregated table or something like that), then it would be perhaps

value.excerpt: Power BI dashboard and reports come with a usage metric, which you can see how users used this content. value.title: Custom Functions Made Easy in Power BI
value.excerpt: I have written a lot about Power Query M scripting language, and how to create custom functions with that. value.title: Extract Parts of a Text Value in Power BI using a Delimiter Power Query Transformation
value.excerpt: If you have a text field and you want to extract a part of that text field, there are multiple ways to do that. You can do this using the SUBSTRING function in DAX. However, These types of actions are better to be done using Power Query transformations. Fortunately, Power Query is very easy and simple

value.title: Get the Day of the Week Name and Number in Power BI Using DAX
value.excerpt: If you don't have a date table with a column that represents the day of the week name (Saturday, Sunday, Monday etc) or number (from zero to six, or from one to seven), and you just have a date field, which you want to quickly get the day name of the week, here is a quick trick for you. value.title: How to IMPORT data from a Power BI dataset   Premium only
value.excerpt: Get data from a Power BI dataset is creating a live connection, which is the recommended way because you will get the entire model. value.title: Import Azure Active Directory Users into Power BI   An Step toward Dynamic Row Level Security
value.excerpt: A question that I often get when I explain what the dynamic row-level security in Power BI is and how it works, is that; how can we get all the users in an Active Directory tenant imported into Power BI? There are other benefits also to import Azure Active Directory (AAD) users loaded into Power BI for

value.title: Multi select slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: This is a very short, simple video about how to have a multi-select slicer in Power BI. Power BI slicer is in fact multi-select by default, however, there is a very small option that if you set it, makes it even easier to use, let’s talk about it. read my article about this here: https://radacad.com/multi-select-slicer-in-power-bi

value.title: Power BI Calendar Visual
value.excerpt: Power BI doesn’t have a built-in calendar visual. Although there are some custom visuals for building a calendar, however, custom visuals come with some limitations sometimes. value.title: Power BI Get Data from Google Sheets
value.excerpt: Power BI can get data from Google Sheet now. This functionality is released just yesterday and announced in both Power BI and Power Query blogs. The feature is still preview (Beta) but it is worthwhile looking at how it works in a quick article and video. Study more from my blog article here:  https://radacad.com/power-bi-get-data-from-google-sheets

value.title: TOPN DAX Function   How it works in Power BI   Comparison against the top group

value.title: Using OR conditions between slicers in DAX
value.excerpt: How to implement a logical OR condition between two slicers of a Power BI report, or of a PivotTable in Excel. By default, when relying on more than one slicer they are considered in an AND condition. This video+article explains how to change this behavior using DAX.  Article and sample download: https://sql.bi/66373?aff=yt

value.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Monitor and audit usage
value.excerpt: Learn how to use activity logs and auditing with Power BI to monitor and inspect user activity in a Power BI environment.

value.title: Connect data to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides the foundational information needed to connect to your data confidently with the new platform.
